item.title: 【SD Live Performances】SDTV - Genesis - When in Rome, Circus Maximus, Rome, Italy, 14-07-2007
item.description:
This is a great concert from the rock legends Genesis. I extracted the videos from 2 DVSs, I joined them, edited them with Avisynth (deinterlaced with QTGMC, resized, cropped) and saved in MP4 AVC format within a MKV container, I converted the audio to AAC, I edited the chapters and added all song titles.
